queries.getBrawlerPowers: select b.name as brawler, p.name, p.type, p.rank from brawler b inner join power p on (b.id = p.brawler_id) where b.id = ?
queries.getBrawlerGear: select b.name as brawler, g.name from brawler b inner join brawler_gear bg on (b.id = bg.brawler_id) inner join gear g on (bg.gear_id = g.id) where b.id = ?
